=====================
KE mixed tanru chain
=====================

mi ke klama ke'e bo citka bo ke dansu ke'e
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (word))
    (selbri
      (tanru_unit (ke) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))) (kehe))
      (bo)
      (tanru_unit (word))
      (bo)
      (tanru_unit (ke) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))) (kehe)))))
